actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

official_title: To amend the Migrant and Seasonal Agricultural Worker Protection Act.

summary.text: Amends the Migrant and Seasonal Agricultural Worker Protection Act to exclude from the definition of "farm labor contracting activity" a migrant or seasonal agricultural worker in a carpool arrangement. Exempts an agricultural employer or association from confirming the registration of a farm labor contractor who supplies only worker transportation services unless the employer or association had actual knowledge that the transportation was not a worker carpooling arrangement. Subjects motor vehicle safety insurance provisions to State, rather than specified Federal, requirements.

titles.title: To amend the Migrant and Seasonal Agricultural Worker Protection Act.
